tool_description: Generate a random activity if you are bored XD
name: Random Activity Generator
title: Random Activity Generator

api_list.name: Get a Random Activity
api_list.description: Returns a randomly generator activity for your lazy bum to do!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-activity-generator.p.rapidapi.com/v1/random-activity"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-activity-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://random-activity-generator.p.rapidapi.com/v1/random-activity"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-activity-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
